summary: Legends speak of hidden Nordic ruins only the Dragonborn is powerful enough to conquer. Kunthar Keep is amongst these ancient tombs, with a powerful weapon hidden within. Fight your way to the crypt and wield the power of the ancient Skofnung sword!
descriptionHtml:
[heading][size=6][color=#ff0000][b]Kunthar Keep[/b][/color][/size][/heading]
[color=#ff0000][size=4][b]Background:[/b][/size][/color]
[size=3]Legends speak of hidden Nordic ruins only the Dragonborn is powerful enough to conquer. Kunthar Keep is amongst these ancient tombs, with a powerful weapon hidden within. Many have tempted fate and tried their luck in hopes to retrieve this legendary sword, but none who enter have ever returned. Kunthar rose to power in the ancient world through the use of this powerful sword, the Skofnung. After his death, the Nords believed no one was capable of wielding such power, and it was sealed deep within Kunthar’s Keep. Fight your way to the crypt and wield the power of the ancient Skofnung sword![/size]

[color=#ff0000][size=4][b]Location:[/b][/size][/color]
[size=3]Kunthar Keep is located north of Falkreath as seen as on the map below. The marker will be visible, but you will not be able to fast travel to it until you discover it.
[/size]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/oOUOyi9.jpg[/img][/center][color=#ff0000][size=4]
[b]Installation:[/b][/size][/color]
[size=3]-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72682/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D72682&pUp=1]Download Kunthar Keep[/url].
-Go to C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim.
-Merge the "Data" folder in the zip file with the data folder in the above Skyrim file.
-Launch Skyrim and click on "Data Files", make sure the Kunthar Keep file is marked to load.[/size]

[color=#ff0000][size=4][b]Credits:[/b][/size][/color]
[size=3]747823-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3871/?]Weapons of the Third Era[/url][/size]

[url=http://www.whateverdevelopment.com/][center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/8qBLlPz.png[/img][/center][/url]
author: Whatever Development
